segments.text: Excuse me , sir . You can't park here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am just waiting for my friends . It won't be long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , the curb here is not for parking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I didn't see the sign , Ma â€™ am .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a sign at the corner of the street . When you turned in here , you should have seen it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , sir . I have to give you a ticket . You can appeal to the court within 14 days . You will avoid paying the fine if you can prove that you are not at fault .
segments.speaker: S1
